The great rush to buy holiday gifts on the day after Thanksgiving also known as Black Friday has changed PERIOD Of course you can be certain that malls and shops will still be crowded with bargain hunters in a frenzy of postThanksgiving shopping PERIOD However the Internet has added a new dimension to the usual popular giftbuying days PERIOD



Cyber Monday is the new name given to the first Monday following the Thanksgiving weekend and its the online equivalent of Black Friday for holiday shopping PERIOD Shoppers flock to the Web to get special deals or make purchases on items theyve considered over the previous weekend PERIOD

As consumers have gotten more accustomed to shopping online the amount of money spent on Cyber Monday has crept steadily higher according to Internet marketing research firm comScore PERIOD Online sales for the day have gone from  million in  to  million in  PERIOD

Still many shoppers are concerned about the security of buying items online PERIOD Being smart about online shopping includes knowing how to get the best deals  but you also need to know how to do so safely PERIOD

The Federal Trade Commission offers online shopping safety tips on its website at www.FTC.gov PERIOD Advice from the FTC includes

 Dont email personal information such as your credit card checking account or Social Security numbers to any seller its not a secure way to transmit information PERIOD To pay safely online look for websites with indicators that the seller has security measures in place like a lock icon in the browsers status bar or a URL that begins with https. the s stands for secure. look for retail merchants that offer a verifiable physical address and phone number in case you have questions or problems PERIOD Never reply to emails or click on popup messages that ask for personal or financial information PERIOD

When youre sure youre shopping on a secure website you can consider these holiday shopping tips as well PERIOD

 Look for extra discounts PERIOD If youve shopped at a certain retailers online shop before check your emails for codes that can give you discounts PERIOD There are also a number of online coupon code sites where you can find coupons from major retailers that can cut the price youre paying or waive shipping fees PERIOD

 Dont wait PERIOD The longer you wait to shop the higher shipping charges will be  and shipping coupons might expire a number of days before the final rush of shopping PERIOD Plan ahead and youll have the largest selection and the lowest cost PERIOD

Get your holiday shopping done early and save time and money this season with these smart tips for Cyber Monday PERIOD
